Package ipp.estg.database.repositories.interfaces

Interface IChannelRepository

All Superinterfaces:
IRepository<Channel>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelRepository
public interface IChannelRepository extends IRepository<Channel>
Interface for the ChannelRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface. This interface provides methods for channel-specific operations such as adding, updating, and managing participants within a channel.

  • Method Details

    • add

      boolean add(int ownerId, String channelName) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Adds a new channel to the repository.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the user who owns the channel.
      channelName - The name of the channel.
      Returns:
      True if the channel is successfully added, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - If there is an error while writing to the file or database.

    • isPortOnline

      boolean isPortOnline(int port)
      Checks if the port of the channel is online.
      Parameters:
      port - The port of the channel.
      Returns:
      True if the port is online, otherwise false.

    • addParticipant

      void addParticipant(int channelId, int userId) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Adds a participant to a specified channel.
      Parameters:
      channelId - The ID of the channel.
      userId - The ID of the user to add as a participant.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - If there is an error while writing to the file or database.

    • removeParticipant

      void removeParticipant(int channelId, int userId) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Removes a participant from a specified channel.
      Parameters:
      channelId - The ID of the channel.
      userId - The ID of the user to remove as a participant.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - If there is an error while writing to the file or database.
